definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Properly smoked and hung, joints of pork would keep well for up to two years.
sentences.chinese: 腌肉或烤肉制作良好的话，像猪后腿可以保藏两年。

sentences.english: We serve ham or bacon with your eggs. Which would you prefer ?
sentences.chinese: 我们提供火腿或腌肉夹蛋，您要哪一种？

sentences.english: Which was slightly reminiscent of a friend of mine who is vegetarian except for bacon, but nonetheless . . .
sentences.chinese: 这有点像我一个吃素的朋友只吃腌肉。

sentences.english: You need salt and sugar to preserve meat.
Folks ai n't got money to buy side meat let alone gewgaws.
sentences.chinese: 人们连买腌肉的钱也没有，别说什么首饰了。

sentences.english: Let’s suppose the first item in that list is ‘bacon’
sentences.chinese: 假设清单上的第一项是“腌肉”。

sentences.english: It can be done with some common chemical.
sentences.chinese: 腌肉用一些常见的化学用品就能制成。

sentences.english: Use beer instead of wine to marinate your meat.
Feel the touch of the “bacon hands” on your legs.
sentences.chinese: 去感受“腌肉手”在你腿上的触感。

sentences.english: Feel the smell of darn evil bacon.
sentences.chinese: 去感受那该死的邪恶的腌肉味。

definition: marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
to smoke/to cure over a fire
